name: Deliverer (Miki123_asd, kimarsal)
description:
In this game, you will start receiving commands from many buildings and, to satisfy them, you must buy all the things you are asked in the supermarket by considering all demands and product labels.

Every time you satisfy a demand, you will get experience and with experience you will get stars that will be added to the global count.

Game controls and elements:

  • In the map scene, you must drag arund the map and click on buildings to check their information. In the upper left corner, you will see the star global count and in the upper right corner, you will find the inbox.
  • Every command has 2 lists, one with all the products you must buy and another one with all demands the products have to fulfill (ecologic, sustainable agriculture...)
  • In the supermarket scene, you must press the arrow buttons located at the borders to slide the shelves. To select a product, you must click it and check the information and, if you decide to pick it, you must drag it to the basket. You can check the lists of the command every time at this point.
  • Finally, once you decide to complete the groceries, you will meet a nice receip scene where you will be told what products and demands you satisfied correctly.

Finally, we must say it's a demo. The whole game is fully designed and has a project paper, but this implementation is just a demo.
